reviewText: Mr. Colson brings together a sampling of Washington insiders that make the position that our government has taken a wrong turn in regards to religious freedom, rule of law, and morality in general.  From the material presented a viewer  could easily wonder if the we are being represented or if our elected officials are beholden to something else.  I have trouble believing most of Americans agree with the changes that are taking place in what appears to be an accelerated manor. The DVD is a wake up call to be more reactive in politics if we disagree with the Washington gang.
